name: Puddle Jumper (Synktra, alschroeder, jclay)
description:
Puddle Jumper (Synktra, alschroeder, jclay) is an adventure-platformer game developed by Synktra, alschroeder and jclay. It was originally released in 2021.
Puddle Jumper (Synktra, alschroeder, jclay) is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
